bibl.title: Chin Quock Wah vs. Henry M. White. Criminal.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Western District Court of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
In the Matter of the Application of Chin Quock Wah for a Writ of Habeas Corpus ) No. 2971 STIPULATION.

IT IS HEREBY STIPULATED AND AGREED by and between the attorneys for the petitioner and respondent herein, that the petitioner offers in evidence exhibits "A" and "B", and that the respondent objects thereto on the ground that they are incompetent, irrelevant and immaterial for the reason that the Commissioner's certificate is not evidence of any adjudication in the case and on the ground that the admission by the Department, offered in evidence, is not res adjudicata of the citizenship of the alleged father in any knd of proceeding and particularly in a proceeding wherein the son is resisting deportation on the ground of the citizenship of residence in America of his alleged father.
div1.ab: Clay Allen G. P. Fishburne Attorneys for Respondent
div1.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In the Matter of the Application of Chin Quock Wah for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
FILED IN THE U. S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, NORTHERN DIVISION APR261915
div1.ab: FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk, By EML Deputy 2x
